com.bill.java.api

Class BDC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bill.java.api.BDC

  • public abstract class BDC
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the parameters required for user authentication and the method to validate the API base URL.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BDC.Env
      the enum that contains the sandbox, production, and alternate sandbox constants

    • Field Detail

      • VERSION

        public static final java.lang.String VERSION
        the current version of the Java Client Library: "0.0.1"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SANDBOX_BASE

        public static final java.lang.String SANDBOX_BASE
        the base URL of the sandbox environment: "https://api-sandbox.bill.com/api/v2"

        The sandbox environment is very similar to the production environment. Money movement is disabled within the environment. Therefore, actions done through the library while set to Sandbox does not incur real-world transactions.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALT_SANDBOX_BASE

        public static final java.lang.String ALT_SANDBOX_BASE
        the base URL of the alternate sandbox environment: "https://api-stage.bill.com/api/v2"

        Users should use "https://api-sandbox.bill.com/api/v2" unless instructed otherwise.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRODUCTION_BASE

        public static final java.lang.String PRODUCTION_BASE
        the base URL of the production environment: "https://api.bill.com/api/v2"

        The production environment is used for real-world deployments. Money movement is enabled within the environment. Therefore, actions taken through the library affects real-world accounts.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • devKey

        public static volatile java.lang.String devKey
        the developer key that is shared when the sandbox account is provisioned. It is required to authorize API usage. Therefore, it needs to be set before making any calls through the library.

      • userName

        public static volatile java.lang.String userName
        email associated with user's Bill.com account. It needs to be set before making any calls through the library.

      • password

        public static volatile java.lang.String password
        password associated with the user's Bill.com account. It needs to be set before making any calls through the library.

      • sessionId

        public static volatile java.lang.String sessionId
        the session ID obtained from logging in. It is automatically set upon logging in. Modification is discouraged.

      • orgId

        public static volatile java.lang.String orgId

      • userId

        public static volatile java.lang.String userId
        the system generated ID of the user that logged in. It is automatically set upon logging in. Modification is discouraged.

      • apiBase

        public static volatile java.lang.String apiBase
        base URL used for all requests. By default, it is set to the sandbox environment: "https://api-sandbox.bill.com/api/v2"

    • Constructor Detail

      • BDC

        public BDC()

    • Method Detail

      • getApiBase

        public static java.lang.String getApiBase()
        Gets the API base URL.
        Returns:
        returns the sandbox, production, or the alternative sandbox API base URL

      • setApiBase

        public static void setApiBase(BDC.Env env)
        Sets the API base URL.
        Parameters:
        env - the environment URL that was defined when using the client library
